main event: A civilian observer spotted a bright round light in the sky in Ruislip Manor, London on August 15, 1955.
interesting points: The object was described as a round, white, steady light, slightly larger than a star., The sighting lasted for 3-5 minutes., The light was glowing bright, with no sound or trail., The observation took place just past dusk on a clear night., A military observer from the USAF was also present and reported the sighting.
sighted object: a bright round light in the sky
witness description: A civilian and a USAF military observer
